Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. 20015006 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Spoonbread, Inc., d/b/a Spoonbread Too, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 364-366 West 110th Street, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 8.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.

Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 010047 ZMQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 22.

Zoning resolution amendment application no. 0000647 ZRK, pursuant to §197-d and §200 of the New York City Charter, concerning changes in the text of the zoning resolution, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 35, to make the regulations of Article 1, Chapter 5 applicable to the conversion of manufacturing and commercial buildings to residential use in Brooklyn Community District 8.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Conversion of manufacturing/commercial bldgs to residential, Brooklyn, (200000647ZRK)

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. 000024 ZMK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning changes to the zoning map, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 35.

Zoning resolution amendment application no. 010065 ZRY, pursuant to §197-d and 200 of the New York City Charter, concerning changes in the text of the zoning resolution, Citywide relating to an  Amendment to the Zoning Resolution to modify sign regulations.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Changes to modify sign regulations, Citywide, (010065ZRY)

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the regulation of outdoor advertising and repealing subdivision 10 of section 26-126.4 of such code in relation thereto
